TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDictionary`2<TKey, TValue> implements class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<valuetype System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2<!TKey, !TValue>>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<valuetype System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2<!TKey, !TValue>>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public Interface IDictionary(Of TKey, TValue) Implements ICollection(Of KeyValuePair(Of TKey, TValue)), IEnumerable(Of KeyValuePair(Of TKey, TValue))

generic <typename TKey, typename TValue> public interface class IDictionary : System::Collections::Generic::ICollection<System::Collections::Generic::KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>>, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::Collections::Generic::KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>>
type IDictionary<'Key, 'Value> = interface interface ICollection<KeyValuePair<'Key, 'Value>> interface seq<KeyValuePair<'Key, 'Value>> interface IEnumerable

typeparam.name: TKey
typeparam.span: 字典中之索引鍵的類型。

span.span: The type of keys in the dictionary.
The type of values in the dictionary.

summary.span: 表示索引鍵/值組的泛型集合。

span.span: Represents a generic collection of key/value pairs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面是針對索引鍵/值組的泛型集合的基底介面。The interface is the base interface for generic collections of key/value pairs. 每個項目是儲存在索引鍵/值組物件。Each element is a key/value pair stored in a object. 每個組必須具有唯一索引鍵。Each pair must have a unique key. 實作有所不同是否允許`key`是`null`。Implementations can vary in whether they allow `key` to be `null`. 這個值可以是`null`並不需要是唯一的。The value can be `null` and does not have to be unique. 介面可讓包含的索引鍵和要列舉的值，但它並不代表任何特定排序順序。The interface allows the contained keys and values to be enumerated, but it does not imply any particular sort order. `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中`for each`c + + 中) 傳回集合中的項目類型的物件。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`For Each` in Visual Basic, `for each` in C++) returns an object of the type of the elements in the collection. 因為每個項目是索引鍵/值組，項目型別不是索引鍵的類型或值的類型。Since each element of the is a key/value pair, the element type is not the type of the key or the type of the value. 相反地，項目型別是。Instead, the element type is . 例如: For example: [!code-cpp[Generic.IDictionary#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.IDictionary/cpp/source2.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[Generic.IDictionary#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.IDictionary/CS/source2.cs#11)] [!code-vb[Generic.IDictionary#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.IDictionary/VB/source2.vb#11)] `foreach`陳述式是包裝函式，只允許讀取，不寫入至集合的列舉值。The `foreach` statement is a wrapper around the enumerator, which only allows reading from, not writing to, the collection. > [!NOTE] > 因為索引鍵可以被繼承，變更其行為，其絕對唯一性無法保證使用比較方法。Because keys can be inherited and their behavior changed, their absolute uniqueness cannot be guaranteed by comparisons using the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立空的字串，以字串索引鍵，並存取透過介面。The following code example creates an empty of strings, with string keys, and accesses it through the interface. 此程式碼範例會使用方法，將某些項目。The code example uses the method to add some elements. 此範例示範方法會擲回時嘗試加入重複的索引鍵。The example demonstrates that the method throws when attempting to add a duplicate key. 此範例會使用屬性 （C# 中為索引子） 來擷取值，擊發要求的索引鍵不存在，而且可以取代顯示索引鍵關聯的值時，會擲回。The example uses the property (the indexer in C#) to retrieve values, demonstrating that a is thrown when a requested key is not present, and showing that the value associated with a key can be replaced. 此範例示範如何使用方法更有效率的方式來擷取值，如果程式通常必須嘗試不在字典中，以及如何使用中的索引鍵值為方法來測試是否在呼叫之前存在的索引鍵方法。The example shows how to use the method as a more efficient way to retrieve values if a program often must try key values that are not in the dictionary, and how to use the method to test whether a key exists prior to calling the method. 最後，範例會示範如何列舉索引鍵和值在字典中，以及如何將列舉值單獨使用屬性。Finally, the example shows how to enumerate the keys and values in the dictionary, and how to enumerate the values alone using the property. [!code-cpp[Generic.IDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.IDictionary/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Generic.IDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.IDictionary/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.IDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.IDictionary/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.para: 實作的類別必須要有方法來比較索引鍵。
The implementing class must have a means to compare keys.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Add (TKey key, TValue value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Add(!TKey key, !TValue value) cil managed
Public Sub Add (key As TKey, value As TValue)
public: void Add(TKey key, TValue value);

param.name: key
param.span: 做為要加入項目之索引鍵的物件。

span.span: The object to use as the key of the element to add.

param.name: value
param.span: 做為要加入項目之值的物件。

span.span: The object to use as the value of the element to add.

summary.span: 將具有提供之索引鍵和值的項目加入 。

span.span: Adds an element with the provided key and value to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您也可以使用屬性所設定的值不存在的索引鍵的字典; 中加入新項目，例如`myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`C# 中 (`myCollection("myNonexistentKey") = myValue`在 Visual Basic 中)。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the dictionary; for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue` in C# (`myCollection("myNonexistentKey") = myValue` in Visual Basic). 不過，如果指定的索引鍵已經存在字典中，設定屬性會覆寫舊的值。However, if the specified key already exists in the dictionary, setting the property overwrites the old value. 相反地，方法不會修改現有的項目。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. 實作可以改變它們如何判定相等的物件。例如，類別會使用，而類別可讓使用者指定實作来用於比較索引鍵。Implementations can vary in how they determine equality of objects; for example, the class uses , whereas the class allows the user to specify the implementation to use for comparing keys. 實作有所不同是否允許`key`是`null`。Implementations can vary in whether they allow `key` to be `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立空的字串、 整數索引鍵，並存取透過介面。The following code example creates an empty of strings, with integer keys, and accesses it through the interface. 此程式碼範例會使用方法，將某些項目。The code example uses the method to add some elements. 此範例示範方法會擲回時嘗試加入重複的索引鍵。The example demonstrates that the method throws an when attempting to add a duplicate key. 此程式碼是可編譯及執行之較大範例的一部分。This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed. 請參閱 。See . remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作可以改變它們如何判定相等的物件。例如，類別會使用，而類別可讓使用者指定實作来用於比較索引鍵。Implementations can vary in how they determine equality of objects; for example, the class uses , whereas the class allows the user to specify the implementation to use for comparing keys. 實作有所不同是否允許`key`是`null`。Implementations can vary in whether they allow `key` to be `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來測試機碼是否存在然後才呼叫方法。The following code example shows how to use the method to test whether a key exists prior to calling the method. 它也示範如何使用方法，可以更有效率的方式來擷取值，如果程式經常會嘗試不在字典中的索引鍵值。It also shows how to use the method, which can be a more efficient way to retrieve values if a program frequently tries key values that are not in the dictionary. 最後，它會示範如何插入項目使用屬性 （C# 中為索引子）。Finally, it shows how to insert items using property (the indexer in C#). 此程式碼是可編譯及執行之較大範例的一部分。This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed. 請參閱 。See . param.name: key
param.span: 要取得或設定之項目的索引鍵。

span.span: The key of the element to get or set.

summary.span: 取得或設定具有指定索引鍵的項目。

span.span: Gets or sets the element with the specified key.

value.span: 具有指定索引鍵的項目。

span.span: The element with the specified key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會提供可以使用下列語法存取集合中的特定元素的能力： `myCollection[key]` (`myCollection(key)`在 Visual Basic 中)。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[key]` (`myCollection(key)` in Visual Basic). 您也可以使用屬性所設定的值不存在的索引鍵的字典; 中加入新項目，例如`myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`C# 中 (`myCollection("myNonexistentKey") = myValue`在 Visual Basic 中)。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the dictionary; for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue` in C# (`myCollection("myNonexistentKey") = myValue` in Visual Basic). 不過，如果指定的索引鍵已經存在字典中，設定屬性會覆寫舊的值。However, if the specified key already exists in the dictionary, setting the property overwrites the old value. 相反地，方法不會修改現有的項目。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. 實作可以改變它們如何判定相等的物件。例如，類別會使用，而類別可讓使用者指定實作来用於比較索引鍵。Implementations can vary in how they determine equality of objects; for example, the class uses , whereas the class allows the user to specify the implementation to use for comparing keys. C# 語言使用關鍵字來定義索引，而不必實作屬性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 會將 實作為預設屬性，這樣會提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 實作有所不同是否允許`key`是`null`。Implementations can vary in whether they allow `key` to be `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性 （C# 中為索引子） 來擷取值，擊發要求的索引鍵不存在，而且可以取代顯示索引鍵關聯的值時，會擲回。The following code example uses the property (the indexer in C#) to retrieve values, demonstrating that a is thrown when a requested key is not present, and showing that the value associated with a key can be replaced. 此範例也示範如何使用方法更有效率的方式來擷取值，如果程式通常必須嘗試不在字典中的索引鍵值。The example also shows how to use the method as a more efficient way to retrieve values if a program often must try key values that are not in the dictionary. 此程式碼是可編譯及執行之較大範例的一部分。This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed. 請參閱 。See . remarks.format: ## Remarks 在傳回的索引鍵的順序並未指定，但一定要依照中的對應值的相同順序傳回屬性。The order of the keys in the returned is unspecified, but it is guaranteed to be the same order as the corresponding values in the returned by the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何列舉金鑰單獨使用屬性。The following code example shows how to enumerate keys alone using the property. 此程式碼是可編譯及執行之較大範例的一部分。This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed. 請參閱 。See . span.span: The key whose value to get.

param.name: value
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，如果找到索引鍵，則為與指定索引鍵建立關聯的值；否則為「值」參數的類型預設值。

span.span: When this method returns, the value associated with the specified key, if the key is found; otherwise, the default value for the type of the value parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會結合的功能方法和屬性。This method combines the functionality of the method and the property. 如果找不到索引鍵，然後在`value`參數取得類型的適當預設值`TValue`; 例如，整數類型零 (0)`false`針對布林類型，和`null`參考類型。If the key is not found, then the `value` parameter gets the appropriate default value for the type `TValue`; for example, zero (0) for integer types, `false` for Boolean types, and `null` for reference types. ## Examples 此範例示範如何使用方法來擷取值。The example shows how to use the method to retrieve values. 如果程式經常會嘗試不在字典中的索引鍵值方法可以是更有效率使用屬性 （索引子在 C# 中），嘗試擷取不存在的索引鍵時，會擲回例外狀況。If a program frequently tries key values that are not in a dictionary, the method can be more efficient than using the property (the indexer in C#), which throws exceptions when attempting to retrieve nonexistent keys. 此程式碼是可編譯及執行之較大範例的一部分。This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed. 請參閱 。See . [!code-cpp[Generic.IDictionary#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.IDictionary/cpp/source.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[Generic.IDictionary#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.IDictionary/CS/source.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Generic.IDictionary#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.IDictionary/VB/source.vb#8)]
